channel.title: Nginx on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Nginx on Home

item.title: Using Oracle Cloud Free tier
item.description: Brief summary paragraph The problem This week I have been searching for solutions to use domains with my applications running in containers in my MacBook Pro server. Yes, I have converted my MacBook Pro into a server, at least for now. The first solution was to use a PiHole as a local DNS and it works fine, but the problem is that I have to specify ports to get into the applications and it gets annonying.
